Articles.Content: Like the title says.  See the shot.  I have no ability to create maneuver nodes, nor do I have any flight paths or orbital lines.  No setting I can find helps this.

UPDATE:  The save itself was glitched.  Not sure what happened, but I deleted the saved campaign, started over, and this doesn't happen.  Not sure why it happened to begin with, so maybe the devs need to look into this?
This has happened to me on about half my saves.
